body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting our customer service team at Gray Motors. My name is Philip Gray. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Philip, my name is Diane Price.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diane. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've been having some issues with managing the data related to my recent purchase from your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand the importance of managing data accurately. Could you please provide me with the VIN number of your vehicle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the VIN number is five six zero two nine one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Can you also share your date of birth with me for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my date of birth is January second nineteen ninety-eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Diane. We will investigate the data management issue promptly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. I'm feeling relieved knowing it will be resolved. Thank you for your help, Philip.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Diane. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
